channel.title: Coordinates?
channel.description:
Can somone tell me how to make this? [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/5dmal4.png[/img]
Also, I know this is the wrong section but how can I make it in my client where if I right-click on somthing it gives me it coords too(So its easier to delete)
Thanks in advance!!
P.S. If you don't understand what I want in my pic instead of having what is circled, I want it to have my player's coords.

item.title: Coordinates?
item.dc:creator: @KillinXxSMile KillinXxSMile
item.description:
@KillinXxSMile wrote:

[quote=“Christopher_L, post:5, topic:269022”]Thats the client thing yes

What in my pic is on the right tab - the one you goto run in. under Energy Left: 100% where it says: Weight carried, I want it to say Coordinates: X Coord, Y Coord

like in all-star scape, I tried to copy +paste the code but it failed somone please help me?[/quote]

you will probaly have to get rid of the weight void
then add this
and if there isn’t one then you should have a problem

    public void appendPos() {
        try {
            sendQuest("X: " + absX + " Y: " + absY, 184);
            sendQuest("Your coordinates", 183);
        } catch (Exception e) {
            println_debug("Error");
        }
    }

Read full topic
